greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: Sum_{n>=0} x^n*(1 + x^n)^n.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} binomial(n/d, d-1) for n>0 with a(0) = 1. - _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 25 2018
example: where we have the following series identity:
mathematica: terms = 100; Sum[x^n*(1 + x^n)^n, {n, 0, terms}] + O[x]^terms // CoefficientList[#, x]& (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 16 2017 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n,t=1)=local(A=1+x); A=sum(k=0, sqrtint(n+1), x^(k*(k+1))/(1 - t*x^(k+1) +x*O(x^n))^(k+1) ); polcoeff(A, n)}
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 10 2012
